page.title: 10Home life
page.content: The majority of household have a stable home life. Of those questioned 60% have a pet. The family meet at mealtimes all the time in 12% of households, at least once a dy in a further 30% and at week-ends or on sundays only 12%. In 40% of households the main meal of the day is at midday and in 60% it is eaten in the evening. Heating is by several methods e.g. central heating by electricity, oil, gas (natural/bottled), solid fuel, older, poorer people have open fires. Cooking is by electricity, gas, solid-fuel ranes. Microwave owens are refrigerators and many now own freezer, filled with their own garden produce, self-picked frarm produce, or purhased goods. Taking short holiday breaks is popular with those in work and retired people.
